info.title: Retailer to Woop
info.description: First, all informations about Woop API headed to retailers are centralized in this documentation. If you need precisions or have any questions, please contact internal technical team. To use the API, you need to take your access you got during the creation of your account on Woop platform. The current offered version is Version 1.4.0

post.description: A method to create a collect request for a specific exchange place. As soon as the request is validated, the collect order is saved in the plateform.

requestBody.description: Contains the informations to create a collect order

400.description: Missing or incorrect elements in the request body

value.message: child "location" fails because [child "addressLine1" fails because ["addressLine1" is required], child "id" fails because ["id" is required]]

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

403.description:
Collect order can not be created

[Reasons](https://woop.stoplight.io/docs/retailer/branches/english/docs/3.%20Models/Reasons.md)

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

409.description: A collect order with this reference already exists in the plateform

post.description:
This method saves an order in Woop plateform.
If the order is validated, delivery quotes are requested to carriers and the delivery is created when one of them is accepted.

requestBody.description: Contains informations to create an order

201.description: Order has been created in the platform

400.description: Missing or incorrect elements in the request body

value.message: child "picking" fails because [child "interval" fails because ["interval" at position 0 fails because [child "start" fails because ["start" is required]]]]

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

409.description: An order with specified 'orderId' already exists

get.description: This method returns detailled orders according to the filters selected

200.description: OK. Contains one or many orders

value.message: child "deliveryStatus" fails because ["deliveryStatus" must be one of [DELIVERY_INIT]]

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

403.description: Request can not be processed for the 'storeId' selected

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

requestBody.description: Contains details about the order cancellation

comment.description: Optional comment to fill if cancellation needs it

202.description: Cancellation has been processed. Additional fees may be incurred

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

403.description: The order can not be cancelled

get.description: This method returns a detailled order

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

patch.description: This method allows to update some informations of a specific order. Update can trigger a cancel + creation process if the modifications have an impact on the eligibility or delivery

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

403.description:
Update order can not be processed

[Reasons](https://woop.stoplight.io/docs/retailer/branches/english/docs/3.%20Models/Reasons.md)

get.description: This method returns a delivery label according to the order ID. The label is available in different formats (if the carrier accepts the format)

base64.description: The label format is either base64 or the one indicated in the request

trackingPageUrl.description: Link to the tracking page url

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

403.description: Request can not be processed for the 'storeId' selected

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

post.description: This methode places an order for product(s) return

requestBody.description: Contains informations for product return request

400.description: Missing or incorrect elements in the request body

value.message: child "location" fails because [child "addressLine1" fails because ["addressLine1" is required], child "id" fails because ["id" is required]]

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

403.description:
Return creation forbidden or initial order state does not allow a product return

[Reasons](https://woop.stoplight.io/docs/retailer/branches/english/docs/3.%20Models/Reasons.md)

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

409.description: Request of a product return with the 'referenceNumber' already exists

get.description: This method returns informations about the documents attached to an order

204.description: No documents attached to the order

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

get.description: This method returns all documents attached to an order in a zip format

200.description: OK. Contains the documents in a zip format

204.description: No documents attached to the order

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

get.summary: Download documents attached to an order

get.description: This method returns specified document for an order

200.description: OK. Contains the document in its original format

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

get.summary: Download one document attached to an order

get.description:
This method returns a list of pickup points around a geolocation and optional parameters. 

[Go to explication](https://woop.stoplight.io/docs/retailer/branches/english/docs/3.%20Models/PickupPoint-Management.md)

200.description: OK. Contains pickup points detailled list

externalCategory.description: Returns the category of the relay point as named at the carrier.

400.description: Missing or incorrect elements in the request body

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

403.description: Request can not be processed for the 'storeId' selected

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

post.description:
This method initializes the subscriptions to our APIs.

More informations in the dedicated documentation "Subscriptions"

carrier.description: Callback allowing to receive carrier choice

status.description: Callback allowing to receive order status changes

score.description: Callback allowing to rceive the customer notation

deliveryClosure.description: Callback allowing to receive the billing informations

event.description: Callback allowing to receive the notifications send to customer

headers.description: Additional HTTP Headers to send during callback

basic.description: To be defined if you choose basic API authentication method

oauth2.description: To be defined if you choose oauth2 API authentication method

tokenEndPoint.description: Url to retrieve the access token according to clientId and clientSecret

token.description: To be defined if the authentication method gives a bearer token from a username/password combination

endpoint.description: Url used to retrieve the access token

400.description: Missing or incorrect elements in the body

200.description: List of eligible carriers and services

types.description: Types of eligible pickup points (for SERVICE_PICKUP_POINT service)

categories.description: Categories of eligible pickup points (for SERVICE_PICKUP_POINT service)

400.description: Missing or incorrect elements in the request body

401.description: Vous n'tes pas autoris  accder  cet lment

post.description: A method to retrieve the delivery carriers and services available for an order. Carriers and services returned depend on the picking location, delivery location (optional), the products/packages.

get.summary: Download orders slip to a specific retailer

200.description: OK. Contains the document in its original format

204.description: No document attached to the order

401.description: You are not allowed to access this resource

403.description: Request can not be processed for the 'storeId' or 'exchangePlaceId' selected

value.message: This exchange place is not allowed to be used

get.description: This method returns a single pdf document with a list of orders according to specified parameters (carrier, picking date and delivery status)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: To obtain a Base64 response in json body, specify the value "application/json"

responseOrder.title: Get order response (responseOrder)
responseOrder.description: Specifies the response for getting orders.

postCollects.description: Specifies useful informations to create a collect request (click and collect).
postCollects.title: Collect request (postCollects)

postOrders.description: Specifies useful informations to create an order.
postOrders.title: Order creation (postOrders)

referenceNumber.description: Order reference, number associated to a store. Can equals to orderId.

numberOfPackages.description: You can use this field if you want to send only one package but dividing its weight by X NumberOfPackage. Woop platform will look for NumberOfPackage then calculate the number of non generic packages. Then it will substract this number to NumberOfPackage to divide the package containing the merchandise by the result. WARNING: This field is a particular need of Dcathlon. Please do not consider this field for the Woop MVP if you are not this retailer.

postProductReturn.description: Specifies the useful informations to create a product return request.
postProductReturn.title: Product return request (postProductReturn)

initialCarrier.description: Boolean specifying if the return must be made by the same carrier as the original order.

tags.description: Allowing to define "markers" on this order.
tags.title: Tags

address.description: All useful informations about a delivery/picking address.
address.title: Address (address)

elevator.description:
Indicates if place has a lift
Default value : FALSE

postalCode.description: Corresponds with associated main place postal code

deliveryStatus.title: Delivery status (deliveryStatus)
deliveryStatus.description: Specifies the different possible delivery statuses in the platform.

location.title: Location (location)
location.description: A location represents a delivery/picking location.

interval.title: Date interval (interval)
interval.description: Specifies date interval for a picking/delivery.

services.description: Specifies the delivery services to use.
services.title: Delivery services (services)

packages.description: Specifies the useful informations to edit a package. Handling unit has to be defined within the package/product structure.
packages.title: Packages (packages)

coordinates.description: Specifies the geographic coordinates to use for the creation.
coordinates.title: Geographic coordinates (coordinates)

packagesReferences.description: Specifies the tracking number chosen by the carrier for the packages.
packagesReferences.title: Packages reference (packagesReferences)

productsPrice.title: Products price (productsPrice)
productsPrice.description: Corresponds to the selling price of the products. To be defined for the SERVICE_INSTALL service.

pickupPointCarrier.description: Specifies the selected carrier for a pickup point.
pickupPointCarrier.title: Pickup point carrier (pickupPointCarrier)

cancelledReasons.description: Specifies the possible reasons for a cancellation from the carrier.
cancelledReasons.title: Cancellation reasons (cancelledReasons)

deliveryService.description: Specifies the delivery service that can be used.
deliveryService.title: Delivery service (deliveryService)

lengthUnit.description: Specifies the length unit of measure.
lengthUnit.title: Unit of measure (lengthUnit)

language.title: Language (language)
language.description: Specifies the language code to use for the picking/delivery contact.

errorCode.title: Error code (errorCode)
errorCode.description: Matches the model returned in case of API error.

contactDelivery.title: Delivery contact (contactDelivery)
contactDelivery.description: Informations on delivery contact. (phone number not required)

queryDeliveryStatus.name: deliveryStatus
queryDeliveryStatus.description: Filter orders list by delivery status

queryPickingDate.name: pickingDate
queryPickingDate.description: Filter by picking date. Allows to get orders older than this date.

queryNumber.description: Number of pickup points to get
queryNumber.name: number

queryKilometricDistance.description: Distance of searching radius in kilometers
queryKilometricDistance.name: kilometricDistance
